roleset.name: make sense of, make excuses for

example.name: just transitive
example.text: It astounds me he can rationalize his self-righteous and greedy actions in Utah.
example.arg: his self-righteous and greedy actions in Utah

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Let's-1 *trace*-1 rationalize our priorities by solving pollution problems at the local level as heretofore.
example.arg: by solving pollution problems at the local level as heretofore

predicate.note: Frames file for 'rationalize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.
